ValidationRule.description: This will ensure that an individual day is not greater than 24 hrs
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR(pse__Monday_Hours__c > 24, pse__Tuesday_Hours__c > 24, pse__Wednesday_Hours__c > 24,pse__Thursday_Hours__c > 24, pse__Friday_Hours__c > 24, pse__Saturday_Hours__c > 24, pse__Sunday_Hours__c > 24)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: No individual day for a single line can be more than 24 hours
